#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100005
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 
int64 a[101][3];
 
int64 calc(int i,int j){
	int64 x=(a[i][0]-a[j][0])*(a[i][0]-a[j][0])+(a[i][1]-a[j][1])*(a[i][1]-a[j][1])+(a[i][2]-a[j][2])*(a[i][2]-a[j][2]);
	return x;
}
vector<int>v[101];
bool vis[101];
void dfs(int nod){
	vis[nod]=true;
	for(int i=0;i<v[nod].size();i++){
		int to=v[nod][i];
		if(vis[to])
		continue;
		dfs(to);
	}
}
 
int main(){
	int t,n,i,j;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	int64 d;
	while(t--){
		scanf("%d",&n);
		cin>>d;
		d=d*d;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		cin>>a[i][0]>>a[i][1]>>a[i][2];
		v[i].clear();
		vis[i]=false;}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(j=0;j<n;j++){
				if(calc(i,j)<=d)
				v[i].pb(j);
			}
		}
		int ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			if(vis[i]==false){
				dfs(i);
				ans++;
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
}
return 0;}
